General.Name: Austral Gold Ltd
General.Description: Austral Gold Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, and mining of gold and silver deposits in Chile, the United States, and Argentina. The company holds a 100% interest in the Guanaco/Amancaya gold and silver mine located to the southeast of Antofagasta in Northern Chile. It also holds a 24.74% interest in the Rawhide mine located in Nevada, the United States; a portfolio of exploration projects situated in the Paleocene Belt, Chile; and a 11.91% interest in the Mercur project located in Utah, the United States, as well as a 51% interest in the Sierra Blanca project located in Santa Cruz, Argentina. The company was formerly known as Diamond Rose NL and changed its name to Austral Gold Limited in November 2006. Austral Gold Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Sydney, Australia. Austral Gold Limited is a subsidiary of Inversiones Financieras Del Sur S.A.

0.Name: Mr. Wayne M. Hubert B.Sc., M.B.A., MBA
